scripts.update: cd .. && faas-cli publish --filter redis-set --platforms linux/amd64 && faas-cli deploy --filter redis-set --gateway http://$(minikube ip --profile p1):31112
scripts.invoke: curl -X POST http://$(minikube ip --profile p1):31112/function/redis-set -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d '{"mydata":"Hello World!"}'
scripts.logs: faas-cli logs redis-set --gateway http://$(minikube ip --profile p1):31112
